2.0.4.name: copy-props
2.0.4.description: Copy properties deeply between two objects.

scripts.web:build: browserify index.js --standalone copyProps -o web/copy-props.js && cd web && uglifyjs copy-props.js --compress --mangle -o copy-props.min.js --source-map url=copy-props.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build && node test/web/make.js
